materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ans1","text":"Following things will be provided:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qnpm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43lr5","text":"1. SPECTRA Tube containing centrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27u54","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs1dj","text":"2. Swabs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kjgg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sm6p","text":"3. Total 18 samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7kq8n","text":"Obtain any RNA (RNase P, SARS CoV-2, etc.)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":36,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":41,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f50tk","text":"Quantify the RNA using a Nanodrop or RT-PCR. Convert to copy number using the following tool.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7222u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4je7d","text":"RNA copy number calculator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":26}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B23E36D09FED11EC9065916C9878E1E8","url":"http://www.scienceprimer.com/copy-number-calculator-for-realtime-pcr"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rebt","text":"Open the screw cap of the SPECTRA device and place it on a 50ml falcon stand (try to minimize exposure to air by keeping the device opened. Open the SPECTRA device just before loading the swab) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"moit","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gqcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mi3m","text":"Caution: the swab is slightly hydrophobic, hence try to smear the 10ul drop over the nylon flock with a pipette tip","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebk0u","text":"Put the swab into the centrifuge tube present inside the SPECTRA tube, and cut the plastic body just above the nylon flock head","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"esoe1","text":"Close the 50ml centrifuge tube by screwing it tight ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n8vb","text":"Store the SPECTRA tube for different durations at room temperature (25°C) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60igt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db3ul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0gfv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6k1lb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en0k2","text":"(2 controls, and 3 test)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,"119"],"data":[["Sample description","Storage Duration in hours","Sample code"],["VTM Control","0",""],["Dry swab in SPECTRA","24","RNA A-1, RNA A-2"],["Dry swab in SPECTRA","24hrs","RNA B-1, RNA-B2"]],"guid":"ED442FF09FA211ECBDA0BFECD6201506","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Sample description","Storage Duration in hours","Sample code"],["VTM Control","0",""],["Dry swab in SPECTRA","24","RNA A-1, RNA A-2"],["Dry swab in SPECTRA","24hrs","RNA B-1, RNA-B2"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ma8r","text":"Add    of nuclease-free water to    centrifuge tube and mix it vigorously using a vortexer for at least 5 seconds each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fonf5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d6cnu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uegp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"86C8AD6C9FA311EC82F70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"86C8ADF69FA311EC82F70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":1859,"brand":"VWR","can_edit":0,"guid":"125AF8609FED11EC9065916C9878E1E8","link":null,"name":"Vortexer","sku":"97043-562","specifications":null,"type":"","vendor":{"id":479,"name":"VWR Scientific","link":"https://us.vwr.com/store/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}
